properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 3:18PM EST until February 10 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY, Peconic and Gardiners Bays and South Shore Bays from Jones
Inlet through Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST MONDAY
